name: Pandamonium Game - Panda's World
description:
Pandamonium has 100 levels of pure fun. Connect pandamonium images until you complete your mission. Think you got it, well new challenges keep coming up.

Features
– fun 100 Levels
– Connect Pandamonium Images to collect them
– Fun Missions you have to complete
– Use power ups like extra moves, live and bomb to help
– Play against friends in Game Center

Play Pandamonium Today.
